title: 20 minute waiting because of bad wifi
body:
hello, a lot of my games don't even start after i choose a champion, i get a black screen then. i don't know how to solve it :( but now i have to wait for the second time 20 minutes, and that for 5 games. i can't do annything about it but i do get AKF, i have almost trie everything i could find on the internet, put my grafics on very low and even re-download league of legends. can annyone help me? i realy like to play this game

thank you!!
yellxw :)

replies.body:
While WiFi is super convenient, it often provides a suboptimal experience for games like League that requires a really stable connection. We wrote up a super interesting article comparing WiFi to Ethernet and how they are different experiences in League, which you can find [here.](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/ethernet-vs-wifi-ping-packets-playing-better)

I recommend working through the steps in our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) as a first step in resolving this. Let me know if those steps caused any change.
